rooms.description: Entrance hall with minimalistic design and subtle natural lighting.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow abundant natural light and a seamless connection with the outdoors. Minimalist design emphasizing clean lines and open space.
Modern dining area integrated within the living room for flexible use and an expansive outlook.
Efficient and minimalist kitchen with modern fixtures. Designed for ease of movement and functionality in accordance with Vastu principles promoting a positive flow of energy.
Dedicated library space with floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light. Minimalist shelves and comfortable seating areas arranged to enhance concentration and a peaceful atmosphere.
Guest room with essential amenities in a minimalist style.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window for optimal illumination and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows for privacy and natural lighting. Vastu-aligned placement to promote harmony.
Secondary bedroom designed in a minimalist style with essential storage.
Additional bedroom in line with the overall design philosophy of minimalism and functionality.
Private gym integrated into the layout with ample space for exercise equipment. Designed to maintain a minimalist aesthetic while ensuring functional use.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample daylight and ventilation.
Additional floor-to-ceiling window aligning with Vastu principles to enhance positivity.

notes: The design considers local building norms and Vastu principles. Emphasis is on natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows, open space for the minimalist aesthetic, and dedicated spaces like library and private gym integrated into a two-story layout covering 5000 sqft with 4 bedrooms (1 master, 3 additional).
